title: Motion of a car from velocity table and graph part - a

content.description: The graph of the velocity v(t), in ft/sec, of a car traveling on a straight road, for 0 ≤ t ≤ 50, is shown above. A table of values for v(t), at 5 second intervals of time t, is shown to the right of the graph
content.question: During what intervals of time is the acceleration of the car positive? Give a reason for your answer

frqParts.text: During what intervals of time is the acceleration of the car positive? Give a reason for your answer

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
